body:
Ayyyyy, so a suggestion thread exploded with stuff about politics, so i thought why not make a thread on it.


Feel free to debate over countries, forms of leadership, etc. 

Please make sure to be respectful, and don't get so hurt over a comment that you don't like.
body_tagged:

Feel free to debate over countries, forms of leadership, etc. 

Please make sure to be respectful, and don't get so hurt over a comment that you don't like.

The problem is people keep associating Muslim with Isis.  They are Islamic Extremist meaning when they read the Quran they interpret extreme ideas.  Even Christians have had extremists, (KKK), we need to treat them as a terrorist group not some big bad because frankly that's what terrorist want, to strike fear in people, and when politicians make rash decisions because they're in fear well that's not a good idea.

reply_to.body_tagged: To be honest, I really would like Donald Trump to become president of the US just to see what would happen. I live in Australia and Malcolm Turnbull isn't too bad. Trump would probably try and have us assassinated though lol.

replies.body:
If Trump gets into the White House, I'm fleeing to Antarctica.
He:
  1. ...Believes that Britain doesn't have a backbone (not true - it's called diplomacy, a far better method of peace than charging in guns blazing. Britain can and will fight against terrorists, other countries, etc.).
  2. ...Believes that Muslims are all terrorists or scum of the earth (on a side note, I distinctly remember a short man with a stupid thing on his face who loved to wave, hated Jews and also thought they were the scum of the earth) and that they cheered on 9/11.
  3. ...Believes that Mexicans are all rapists and murderers - even though his company extorts people and he wears clothes from Mexico.
  4. He refers to his political opponents as "bing bong" (http://gawker.com/donald-trump-has-gone-completely-bing-bong-1723877013 if you haven't already heard about that).
  5. Hates China and believes that America should go to war with them.
In short, if he gets into power, we are all going to die.
Sorry for the depressing reply, but I have self-preservation when it comes to Donald Trump.

replies.body:
If he does get in, he won't be able to do anything without the backing of Congress. And we all know even if they did like him, they would be able to get anything done for him because...

...well it's Congress, that's why.
